response.overview: A film about the creative process of actor Enrique Bustos, from the theatre company La Zaranda, in his search for a new character. At the same time, it’s a travel through the creative process of making the film itself, leading to a mirror game between actor and director —couple in real life—, where the borders of the quotidian get blurred to slide into a territory of memories and fabulations as part of the fight to conjure up the intangible.
response.title: The Language of the Ruin
